shared.facades

Class MapFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.facades.AbstractFacade
      • shared.facades.MapFacade

  • public class MapFacade
extends AbstractFacade
    This facade creates an interface to communicate with the underlying map sub-model.

    • Method Detail

      • canPlaceRoad

        public boolean canPlaceRoad(Player player,
                            EdgeLocation location,
                            boolean isSetup)
        Checks to see if a road can be placed on the map at the specified EdgeLocation.
        Parameters:
        location - EdgeLocation being queried for road placement.
        Returns:
        True if the edge is empty and adjacent to a Road/{City}/settlement belonging to current Player.
        Precondition:
        The Player is in a game.
        Postcondition:
        None

      • canPlaceSettlement

        public boolean canPlaceSettlement(Player player,
                                  VertexLocation location,
                                  boolean isFirstTurn)
        Checks to see if a settlement can be placed on the map at the specified VertexLocation.
        Parameters:
        location - VertexLocation being queried for settlement placement.
        Returns:
        True if the VertexLocation is empty and adjacent to a road belonging to current Player.
        Precondition:
        The Player is in a game.
        Postcondition:
        None

      • canPlaceCity

        public boolean canPlaceCity(Player player,
                            VertexLocation location)
        Checks to see if a city can be placed on the map at the specified VertexLocation.
        Parameters:
        location - VertexLocation being queried for city placement.
        Returns:
        True if the VertexLocation has a settlement belonging to the current Player and adjacent to a road belonging to current Player.
        Precondition:
        The Player is in a game.
        Postcondition:
        None

        Returns:
